feed.title: Obtainium Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.22
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Format exported json by @lagodimos in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1850
  • Update hu.json by @summoner001 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1832
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1853
  • Add Tencent App Store (#1848)
  • Enable icon caching (#1837)

New Contributors

  • @lagodimos made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1850
  • @summoner001 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1832

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.21...v1.1.22

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.24
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add id.json file to support Indonesian language by @robifr in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1861
  • Update hu.json by @summoner001 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1862

New Contributors

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.25
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix broken SourceHut source (#1864) by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1867

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.24...v1.1.25

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.26
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1874
  • App-wide "pretend to be GPlay" option (#1859)
  • UI bugfixes on add app page (#1866)
  • UI tweaks (#1871, #1872)
  • Added "skip latest" option to APKPure (also fallback toggle)
  • Add "title as version" option for GitHub (#1875) by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1878
  • Fix indonesian translation by @robifr in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1870

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.25...v1.1.26
